Name: SPACE HUNT
About the game: SPACE HUNT - is a new cooperative shooter for two players in the style of sci fi. You are in a locked laboratory and you have no chance to get out... So grab your weapons and fight off waves of enemies! Single and cooperative game up to two people and endless gameplay!
Meta Title: SPACE HUNT: Jun 22, 2018, EncoderX and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on SPACE HUNT? Check out the release date (Jun 22, 2018), developer insights from EncoderX, and a complete game summary.
